title: Kandy Cultural Capital

itinerary.title: Temple of the Tooth
itinerary.description: Visit the sacred Temple of the Tooth Relic, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

itinerary.title: Royal Botanical Gardens & Cultural Show
itinerary.description: Explore Peradeniya Gardens and enjoy traditional Kandyan dance performance.

itinerary.title: Tea Plantations & Spice Gardens
itinerary.description: Visit tea estates in the hills and learn about Sri Lankan spices.

description: Discover the cultural heart of Sri Lanka with ancient temples, lush gardens, and traditional performances.
